name: Life's a Beach (boneyard94)
description:
Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

Right Click - Collect metal

Left Click - Reveal metal nearby

Collect as many items as possible and turn them in at your tent for cash. Be sure to keep track of your metal detector's power. If you are low you must use the recharge stations by the large tent across the beach. Watch out for the cops, you aren't allowed to use your metal detector during the peak beach hours or they will chase you down.
